    interstroke_forest_plot interstroke_model_figure interstroke_mrs_figure interstroke_proportion_figure interstroke_spline_figure interstroke_subtypes_figure interstroke_table_one interstroke_table_two irr_table_one

    Interstroke Table one

    is_table_one.Rd

    Interstroke Table one

    Usage

    is_table_one(
  interstroke_data,
  model,
  table_title = NULL,
  env = rlang::caller_env()
)

    Arguments

    interstroke_data

    An Interstroke Dataset

    model

    Standard R format formula e.g. predictor ~ covariate1 + covariate2

    table_title

    Table title

    Value

    A table one flextable

    Examples

    is_table_one(interstroke_data=interstroke_pollution, model = polluteh~eage+bmi+sysbp, table_title="Table 1 - Baseline Characteristics by pollution level")
#> 24 observations missing `polluteh` have been removed. To include these observations, use `forcats::fct_explicit_na()` on `polluteh` column before passing to `tbl_summary()`.
#> Warning: The `stat_by` argument of `modify_header()` is deprecated as of gtsummary
#> 1.3.6.
#> i Use `modify_header(update = all_stat_cols() ~ structure("**{level}** \n N =
#>   {n} ({style_percent(p)}%)", class = "from_markdown"))` instead.
#> i The deprecated feature was likely used in the irishrenalregistry package.
#>   Please report the issue to the authors.
#> a flextable object.
#> col_keys: `label`, `stat_1`, `stat_2`, `stat_3`, `stat_4`, `stat_5`, `stat_6`, `p.value` 
#> header has 1 row(s) 
#> body has 3 row(s) 
#> original dataset sample: 
#>                            label     stat_1     stat_2     stat_3     stat_4
#> 1                       Age, yrs    63 (13)    62 (13)    62 (14)    61 (14)
#> 2        Body Mass Index (kg/m2) 25.0 (4.9) 25.3 (4.6) 26.0 (4.8) 26.1 (4.8)
#> 3 Systolic Blood Pressure (mmHg)   140 (21)   141 (21)   141 (22)   140 (22)
#>       stat_5     stat_6 p.value
#> 1    62 (14)    62 (13)  <0.001
#> 2 26.3 (4.7) 27.5 (5.4)  <0.001
#> 3   141 (22)   140 (22)    0.27
